Headline: #70 Division Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Division/Dearborn
ShortDescription: EB #70 Division buses are rerouted via Division, Clark, Maple, Dearborn, Walton, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near Division/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Clark, Maple, Dearborn, Walton, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near Division/Dearborn.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Division/Dearborn
ShortDescription: #36 Broadway buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via Clark, Oak, State, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near Division/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Oak, State, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near Division/Dearborn.

Allow extra travel time.
